mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed VALUES (feed_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{feedContent}, #{feedImg}, #{feedImgs}, 0, 'feedLoc', sysdate, sysdate, 'feedLock')

select.if: select u.userId, u.userNick, u.userEmail, u.userImg, u.userLock, f.feedNo, f.feedContent, f.feedImg, f.feedLock from feed f, feedTag t, userInfo u where f.feedNo = t.feedNo and f.userId = u.userId and t.tagName=#{value} and rownum <= 8
select u.userId, u.userNick, u.userEmail, u.userImg, u.userLock, f.feedNo, f.feedContent, f.feedImg, f.feedLock from feed f, userInfo u where f.userId = u.userId and rownum <= 16 order by feedNo desc
